website_summaries.verdict: Miami Gorgeous is an effective choice for both pale and dark skin tones. The easy-to-apply mousse will leave you glowing, and won't hurt your wallet.
pros: This mousse provides a natural-looking glow, even for pale skin with pink undertones
And it's easily buildable for those with darker skin tones who want a more noticeable tan
We also liked the subtle smell of this product
cons: Texture of the mousse is off

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it!! I finally found a sunless tanner I love!! No streaks (I used a tanning mitt) no smell!! Love it!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. There absolutely no odor and the mousse is light and dries quickly. I can put it on after my shower and get dressed. I purchased a mitt and that was key to even application. I apply it two days in a row for a darker color and it looks like the real deal. Follow the directions and you will be good to go! So pleased with this product and will definitely continue to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus68

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know that I’ll ever buy another tanning product orher than this one. It goes on so easy evenly with a mit. It’s very moisturizing. It doesn’t smell bad. The tan looks natural. I didn’t have any lines or splotchiness and I’m not an experienced self tanner by any means. I’ve had it in for about 4 days now and the color hasn’t faded. I even got an exfoliating pedicure today and was worried that from the knees down I’d look terrible afterwards and of course the color is lighter but it doesn’t look bad at all. In fact I will probably wait a few more days to reapply. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Popp

customer_reviews.title: Super SEXY Self Tanner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using spray tans self tanners since they came out, and this is by far the BEST self tanner I have found!!! It's so easy to apply and the color is so sexy and gorgeous- my husband loved how it turned out! This is a great product, wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Harpersmommy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color. Good
customer_reviews.text: After first applying my skin looked fairly uneven but after about an hour everything evened it self out. Very nice color. Good product
customer_reviews.author: jackeyelaine

customer_reviews.title: Great on my "Snow White "skin
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I always used the St. Tropez tanning mousse but for $50, its getting expensive. I am fair skinned (blond hair, blue eyes) and this gives me a nice natural looking tan. If you are darker, you can build on a tan by using several coats. It will get darker. Get yourself a good tanning mitt and be sure to put some lotion on knees, elbows, feet and hands before applying. There is very little scent to this and no orange color at all. I have tried many self tanners and even get sprayed at beach bum now and then. I will get this product again. The picture shows just one coat.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning mouse ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tanning mouse ever! Have cancelled my spray tan membership and only use this now. It works IMMEDIATELY, I go from extremely pale to bronzed and beautiful in minutes. Doesn't streak at all and the color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, forgiving
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is probably very forgiving. I’m a self-tanning newbie; I exfoliated and shaved the day before application as directed, but I think my technique left something to be desired. I was also afraid to use too much and consequently used too little. Anyhow - I was sure I had butchered it because the color seemed very uneven. So that night I went ahead and put lotion on and that redistributed the cosmetic bronzer and allowed me to see that the color is actually pretty even and smooth. To me, it does seem a little orange but not offensively so. Overall I’m happy and think it’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! This is my first time using self tanner but it turned out way better than I expected!! I’ve received so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite self-tanner to date! I have tried many over the years, but none quite compare to this. It’s super easy to apply to my whole body in just a few minutes ( I use a tanning mitt), dries almost instantly, doesn’t make me smell as bad as every other self-tanner although it does make me smell a little, lasts a good while and fades evenly and without really any blotchiness or unevenness except for my hands and feet, but I think that's to be expected from most self-tanners. I apply it every few days or so, and a bottle will last me maybe a few weeks. Definitely a great product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER SMITH

customer_reviews.title: so amazing! i used it once and saw results super ...
customer_reviews.text: so amazing! i used it once and saw results super fast. i use with the mit so it doesnt stain my hands. super awesome product, totally reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this.. love the color. Definitely recommend using a mitt for this one as color is pretty instant. Hands will be ORANGE without one, washing immediately after won’t help. I did use rubber gloves to apply once, then took off to do my arms/ hands last, then washed hands. Wasn’t perfect solution, but better than orange hands. Just make sure to rub in evenly very well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a few hours ago and I am straight up orange lol I exfoliated and used a brand new tanning mit :/ maybe it's just me being picky because I usually use my tanning bed or get sun outdoors so I just don't like the look of the sunless tanner, but I feel like Donald Trump.
customer_reviews.author: ErinG

customer_reviews.title: The best self tanner hands down
customer_reviews.text: The best self tanner hands down! I’ve tried so many but this one is amazing! The consistency, it’s nice and light and no orange hands after applying. I would recommend this product to everyone. I look like I was at the beach for the past 2 days and not work lol
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MANY self tanners including professional versions. I love this one! It goes on super smooth and evenly, and you can see the tint straight away so you can spot spaces you may have missed or need to rub in more. Super quick dry and little to no smell at all (the little bit of smell is a good one). I love Neutrogena Micromist but one bottle only does ~3-4 full body tans for $11-13 per bottle. This bottle lasts a long time! The wear-off process is also quite even, no blotchy tan patches :)
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Natural and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Almost zero smell, no streaking, and nice brown coloration (not orange). Very natural looking. I apply lotion lightly to elbows, knees, ankles, and hands; then apply tanner with hands and wash hands after applying to each limb. Haven’t noticed any color transfer at all. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying a sunless tanner because I used Jergens back in the day and had streaks and.... that smell. But this, THIS changed my mind. I looked at other reviews and bought a mitt to make putting it on easier. You can see a difference immediately. I put it on before a night out and wore it throughout the day doing chores. No smell, no streaks. I had a nice tan for the evening! I’m still defintely tan and I bet you could go at least a week without reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Anne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several self tanners (mainly from the drugstore), and have been disappointed when they leave me with an orange hue. I also used to tan at a salon until I decided it wasn’t the healthiest choice. This product is the real deal! It does not streak nor does it leave me orange. It looks like I have been tanning in a salon or just gotten back from a Florida vacation. A little amount goes a long way! I will be getting married in September and this product will be the answer to my prayers for a golden glow! I recommend it to anyone looking for a some natural color!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: This sunless tanner smells terrible. I know, sunless tanners don't have a good reputation for smelling great, but this is horrible from the second it leaves the bottle to the time you wash it off. I applied liberal amounts to my legs and didn't feel like the application was effective at all. I waited the appropriate amount of time before washing it off, too. At that point I ended up using the Sun Labs Ultra Dark brand, knowing it was going to have the effect I was looking for. I would not recommend using this product. There are others out there that work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: With definitely order again! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Hit all the requirements I was looking for: *reasonably priced *easy to use (you can see where you've applied which helps) *natural ingredients *safe on sensitive skin *great looking tan (not too orangy or fake looking) Don't freak out if it looks really dark upon application. Once you rinse off after the suggested amount of time, your great, golden glow will emerge. I'm a beginner self-tanner and I was very pleased with the outcome. Even with very fair skin, my tan looks completely natural and AWESOME! This product is MUCH better than any drugstore brand and not as expensive as many others out there that claim the same results. EXCELLENT VALUE! I will order again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color, easy to use A new must in the self tanning
customer_reviews.text: After years of embracing my pale skin I’ve jumped on the self tanning lotion bandwagon!! This is definitely a winner!!!!! I used the tanning glove as recommended. Pros: Went on really easy and the foam is colored for a guide Minimum scent Dried quickly so I could get back to my life errands etc. The color is awesome! It actually has a little red in it so it really looks like a day in the sun. Not as orange as other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A

customer_reviews.title: this product is useless
customer_reviews.text: ths so called "self tanner" is a total waste of money. FIrst off, when you open the cap and shake it, some of the liquid spills out from the top. Secondly, you can apply this mousse and yes, your skin will look tanned. Just wait and see what happens after you shower ___what happened to my tan?? It got rinsed away with soap. Do not recommend under any circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Same as every other one
customer_reviews.text: Smells exactly like every other self tanner I’ve ever used, so those saying it has “no smell” are either delusional or have zero sense of smell. I can still smell it on my skin after two showers. Additionally, after one shower it already began doing that flakey thing where it stays in creases and folds but wears away everywhere else making you look like you have a skin disease. I have used countless self-tanners for 20+ years and have yet to find a single one that doesn’t smell horrible while developing, or has great color and staying power. My favorite is St. Tropez but you have to deal with the smell. Going to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: NYCGrrrl

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT self-tanner
customer_reviews.text: This remains my favorite self- tanner. The only thing I would change would be to make it less drying. But - I'm in my mid 50s with very dry skin. On a younger person or a person with less dry skin, it would probably be beautiful. I apply with a velour mit and get beautiful, even color that lasts about 4-5 days. If I apply 2 days in a row, the color is deeper and lasts longer. The smell is so minimal it's almost non-existent. It's definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JGaines

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL of self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I have been a loyal Isle of Paradise tan water self tanner for years. I tried this tan mouse on a friends recommendation and I am thrilled. It is the perfect color, not even a touch of orange. Looks so natural, easy to apply (with a mitt) and has a slight tint of color going on so you know where you put it. I have white bedding and did not notice any transfer overnight. It smells neutral, a faint pleasant smell but none of that unpleasant "self tan" odor. I purposely avoid tanning outdoors for my skin's health, and I am a pale Irish ivory naturally, for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: This was a beautiful tan! I love how it’s instant and goes ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful tan! I love how it’s instant and goes on smoothly. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars, is that it was a little orangey for super fair skin like myself. If you are really fair, I would suggest just mixing a tiny bit of lotion in when you apply. It sheers it out enough to cover but not look too fake.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm the queen of self tanners- you name it I've tried it... Just got this one recently and it's awesome!!!! Just looks great and natural... I do use a mitt to apply FYI. I'm really pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Flippin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Won't use any other now.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited and nervous to try this product. I have never tried a tanning mousse before. It is so easy to apply. I used gloves when I did it. Took a bit to dry so I arranged it on a night nobody else was home and I could just hang out until it dried with no rush for getting dressed. I took a shower the next morning and had a beautiful golden tan. I will be using this product at least once a week to maintain my golden glow. If you are scared to try the mousse like I was just go for it! It was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Very sunny natural looking tan.
customer_reviews.text: This tan is gorgeous. My bestie who lives near the beach complimented me on my tan. Very natural and not orange whatsoever. I need something quick easy and this couldn’t be better. I exfoliated first, then applied lotion to my hands, feet, elbows, and knees. I don’t have a mitt so I just used my hands and worked my way up starting at my feet, then air dried for a bit and washed my hands and scrubbed my palms with lemon and salt. Looks amazing and it’s way less expensive than going to a tanning salon for a spray tan. For the future, I think I’ll use a mitt, but this tanner is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries quick, no streaks, nice color!
customer_reviews.text: This self tan isn’t as smelly as the average self tanner, dried quickly, faded evenly, and was a nice color. After if developed, before I showered, it seemed a little orange, but the color was perfect for me once I showered.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebell

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner I’ve used!
customer_reviews.text: I would give color 5 stars...not orangey and if you take time to learn how to put on self tanner it definitely looks like a natural glow. This is the one self tanner I love and I have tried MANY! One tip is to buy the mitt! It helps to go on evenly and smoothly. I am a beginner at self tanning s d I had very few “spots” or “streaks” compared to others. After the 3rd time using, it was easier and had. Early no mistakes, like I said the mitt helps! Love love love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is actually pretty great. I used it as a back up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty great. I used it as a back up because the one I usually buy is not around anymore. It gives great color, not streaky and comes off like any other self tanner. There is a lot in the bottle. I got about 5 full coats which when the tan lasts 5ish days thats more than a month if you're doing it consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Caffee

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works fast. Is easy to apply with a mitt. My only notes would be that it does get very sticky if you are not constantly cool and dry. Also be sure to apply super fast or else it can streak. Overall I love it and will buy again. Love the bronze color it gives. Was exactly what I was hoping for! I had never used a mousse before but am pleasantly surprised. Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go to self tanner! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to let y'all know this tanner is awesome! I used to do spray mobile tanning, and I've used tanners for yrs and tried so many. I found this one because I was searching for a chemical free tanner. It never disappoints. Smells great, it's not streaky or orange. I use a Mitt. It dries super fast. AND considering I workout daily sweat like crazy and shower alot it lasts a good amount of time. But with the awesome proce point I dont mind applying more often anyways. It's like adding lotion after my shower. So I highly recommend you try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SELF-TANNER. CAN'T LIVE WITHOUT THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this tanning mousse. It offers and instant, beautiful, natural, sun-kissed glow that's easy to apply and is streak-free. The color develops fully in a few hours and it lasts for days. Great for a healthy, bronzed glow without the harmful (and aging!) effects of the sun. This looks natural, like you've been out on a yacht for the weekend... of course. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Good even color
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great color, very even (only patchy wear off after 2-3 days on my shins which are VERY dry and flaky -- that a me thing and not the product) Cons: guard color very light and less helpful, still some smell, transferred to sheets/towels even after showering and a few days A good medium bronze after letting it develop overnight before showering, not overly dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I have never used a self tanning product before and let me tell you I am now a believer. It was very easy to apply ( i did purchase the gloves) and did not streak at all. It dried very quickly with no odor. I received tons of comments and no one thought it was a tanning product they just thought i had gone to the beach. It leaves you with a gorgeous glow and my tan lasted at least 6 days with daily workouts. I would recommend this product to everyone because face it even living in Miami there is not always time to go out and tan.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great tan
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, my skin looks beautiful and bright, specially when I'm in the sun, I look like an artist, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cus

customer_reviews.title: You need this! TRUST ME.
customer_reviews.text: I was Using Loving Tan for double the price until I found this gem. Wow, never going back. I like This just as much as LT but probably even more because of the price. Goes on exactly the same, no funky scent, dries in about a minute. No sticky residue either! I apply it after a exfoliate at night; shower it off in the morning! I highly recommend this self tanning mousse to anyone who is looking for a natural looking tan. I use 1-2x a week.
customer_reviews.author: MimiLadybug

customer_reviews.title: Look like you spent the day on the beach in minutes!!
customer_reviews.text: Natural sun kissed color, no weird self tanner smell or dry skin, just perfect color. This is my new favorite product!!
customer_reviews.author: TGboom

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely impressed with this sunless tanner. I noticed right away the the color was very natural. When I was applying it it went if very smoothly and easily. The color was beautiful and I could have honestly left the house right after my application because it wasnt orangey or green like most sunless tanners. And a little goes a long way with this one. I have used a lot of different sunless tanners in my life and this one is by far my favorite. This will be a staple in my beauty routine. I feel like you could get 3 full body applications out of this bottle. Which is way cheaper then your weekly spray tan.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Markvicka

customer_reviews.title: I cannot live without this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely write reviews, however this product is absolutely the best tanner I have ever tried.! I am an avid self tanner and I have tried countless, I mean countless self Tanners. And none of them have ever given me the tan like this one does! Please don’t ever ever stop making this product! By the way, I have a lot of yellow in my skin and it’s very difficult to have a nice tan. All products make you look orange. This one makes you look like you literally just got back from a holiday vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tanner but Only on Body- Not Face
customer_reviews.text: This works great and leaves a beautiful color. I am sold. The only warning is to not use it on your face. I am not prone to breakouts and don’t have oily skin and I get so many pimples from this when used on my face. I didn’t dock any stars for that though because it’s not advertised for the face anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Heathercorcoran00

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed ♥️
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I’m new to self tanning, and I’m glad this is the first one I bought! I’ve always been curious about it, and this just boosted my confidence up so much. Not orange, but golden/bronze look on me. I love this product, and definitely will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: The best!! I usually order jergens natural glow but ...
customer_reviews.text: The best!! I usually order jergens natural glow but this one is so much better. Jergens makes you instant orange & this one does not! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: This Tanner is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff and I've tried almost every self tanner out there! Plus, it's reasonably priced for the results you get. Not streaky and smells pretty good too. Have purchased this product several times and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic color!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to apply this product! It comes out as foam so I feel like it's easier to apply and your skin soaks if up immediately so it doesn't turn out streaky. I put it on and had my husband help and he was amazed at how quickly I turned tan and he thought it looked really nice, too. I didn't notice a scent at all, so those of you who are sensitive to scents and what not would appreciate this product. My skin looks nice and tan now...no orange-y undertones!
customer_reviews.author: Janette X.

customer_reviews.title: Did not streak
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this self tanner. I applied it with a mitt and it went on smoothly and evenly. It dies fast so it helps to work quickly. I have very fair skin and do not look orange at all. The color has lasted about 4-5 days and has faded nicely. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: daniel jermyn

customer_reviews.title: Must Try Sun-Kissed Color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve laid in the tanning bed for years and realize it’s not a healthy option. I’ve also tried so many self-tanners - creams, lotions, sprays, aerosols..most of which leaving me orange or greenish and rubbing of on my clothing. Miami Gorgeous Mousse is like being in the Miami sun without the damaging UV effects! The color is spot on and this has a nice smell! I don’t have to plan the night before. You get instant color that develops. I touch up after my shower. Very important, use an application mit! Super easy to apply and no streaks. I am a believer that will not lay in another tanning bed. You must try Miami Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: It’s Perfect! Best Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Miami Gorgeous Tanning Mousse is the best ever! I have tried many tanning products over the years - some of the most expensive - and nothing even comes close to Miami Gorgeous. The product pumps silky, smooth mousse with beautifully light scent, covers evenly and smoothly in 30 seconds! Really I spent 30 seconds, immediately threw on a white dress and was off to dinner. The tan has the perfect sun kissed glow that rivals any magazine cover, and feels great on the skin. A little aloe cream maintains the tan and it fades perfectly evenly...It’s really the perfect product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great for fair-skinned people
customer_reviews.text: I am very fair and was looking for a Loving Tan doupe. This does the trick, but is not very dark. So medium to deeper skin tones should get the darker option, not the original. It also does not have much by way of a color guard, so if you are inexperienced at applying self tanner, be careful! But overall, great product for the price that delivers on its promises.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. LOVE IT! Say goodbye to the tanning salon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim during Prime Day Specials. Glad that I did. It works quickly and when applied carefully, looks very natural. Recommend getting the self-tanning mitt to go with it for easy application.
customer_reviews.author: dtopp

customer_reviews.title: No foul odor
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product! Gave me a gorgeous tan that’s perfect for summer, and the best part is it had no weird odor like most mousse. Seriously no smell at all, or stained anything it touched. Will be purchasing again as soon as I run out.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: The best self tanner available!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best self tanner on the market. I work in the beauty industry and have tried al kinds of self tanning products over the years. Miami Gorgeous has no scent, does not streak, does not get on your clothes, goes on evenly, has a completely natural tan color and lasts for days! You can apply it last minute if you want to wear a skirt or shorts because the color goes on instantly and smoothly. Plus, it's Paraben free and made with good for you ingredients. There's no need to hide your white legs anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Goes on like butter
customer_reviews.text: I love it, no smell, you can see when it goes on and it goes on well, instead of buying a mit I used a microfiber cloth, I've used a ton of self tanners and always walk away regretting it, I get color but it's not good, this product is good smooth and streak free, just hoping it holds up longer than a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Milam

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve tried all different types of self tanning lotions and mouse. I must say, this is by far my favorite. The color is dark for me since I’m pasty white and lasts even after I sweat like a 400 pound man at the gym and after I shower. No issues with fading and I really don’t notice much of a smell. Goes on smooth and evenly. Definitely recommend especially if you can’t go tanning like me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this mousse. The color guard is perfect, the scent is barely noticeable,( unlike most others on the market) and it actually LASTS. The price point is a steal as far as I’m concerned. I have used similar products at a much higher price point and not been as happy as I am with this mousse. I could go on, but all you really need to know is buy this now. You will not be disappointed! P.s. the customer service is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Kiernan

customer_reviews.title: Light Smell, Hardly Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few self tanners and usually HATE the smell and the feeling. This product has a very faint smell which is super hard to find. It also isn't very tacky which is great when I apply before going out to the bar/club. I wish it would last a little bit longer but 3-4 days it's bad at all for this price. Defiantly apply with a mitt. I've seen reviews saying it could be streaky but the mitt did not leave any streaks for me.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this product! This was my first time self tanning because I got tired of going to tanning beds. It was super easy to apply with a mitt and looked good even on my face. No transfer to clothes or sheets. It was difficult to blend near my ankles and wrists, but moisturizing those areas before applying really helped. Slept with it on and woke up and showered and now I’m the darkest I’ve ever been! Definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything. Literally everything. I've even gotten high quality spray tans but they become blotchy and look terrible when they're coming off. This gives you such a nice bronze color that lasts for about a week and slowly fades rather than separating and becoming blotchy. I don't think I'll ever use anything else to be honest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’ve used every single self tanner out there, but this one has taken the top spot for me! The color isn’t orange at all. The more layers you use the darker the color. The smell is not my favorite, but after the first rinse off it goes away. Of course you can’t beat the price! I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Best tanning mousse out there!
customer_reviews.text: I’m OBSESSED with this tanner!!! I’ve been using it for almost 2 years! I love how easy it is to get an even, nice tan! I usually get dark splotches (especially on my hands) but not with this tanning mousse! I also love the ingredient, lots of vitamins and natural oils!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Consistent, great color, non-stinky
customer_reviews.text: The tan this product gives you is excellent! Not stinky, easy to apply, takes little time to dry, tan lasts about five days if maintained properly. The color is not orangey but rather a golden bronze with a neutral undertone. One bottle can give you up to ten tans, depending on usage. Being a fan of the St. Moritz self tanner for its color and affordability, I prefer this product because of its longevity and consistency in application. I love this product and I will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Rae Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner I have ever used! No smell, easy to use and natural color. I am pale and this gave me a nice bronze glow. My husband even agreed! I would say definitely buy an applicator mitt, it made it super simple. Follow the instructions. They even sent an email with additional advice! No streaks, you can see it as you are Applying and rubbing in. I did moisturize my elbows, hands, knees. Ankles and feet before Applying, so no dark spots. I am a fan, won't buy anything else now!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: A hidden gem!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who uses only St. Tropez or professional salon tans for the last 10 years, this is a hidden gem for me! I was Super pleased with the color, staying power, smell and overall look of this tan. It’s not to red, or orange and not to olive or green either. It looks natural, like I was at the beach all day and just got good sun. Will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Loveless MUA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it a 4/5 stars only because it tended to pick up on my “rougher” scars on my legs BUT I love this stuff. It smells good no chemical smell. Looks natural not orange thank goodness! I definitely recommend if you are looking for a nice quality self tanner that isn’t gunna burn your pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Carlee Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Its as though I just stepped of the Beach after a day in the sun !
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the way this tanner gives me such an authentic looking tan ! The Mitt that the sell separately is by far the best sunless tanner applicator Ive ever used ! There was no need to use gloves because the mitt is lined at the inside making it impossible for tanner to seep through , which is always nice, because nobody wants tanner on their palms ! I am glad I discovered this tanner and will be using permanently on my vanity xo
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Casazza

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: Idk what is in this stuff but it’s the only thing I’ve ever used to make my entire body break out in bumps. Wanted to have a tan for the beach. Spending my vacation in a rash. Update- getting worse before better and itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner EVER
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write reviews, but this product deserves it. I have been self tanning since the age of 13 (now 26) and I’ve tried every product under the sun. Most leave me orange or leave my skin dehydrated and looking like an orange crocodile (especially foaming mouses). With this foam, I get instant color and it DOESNT dry out my skin!! Holy grail! It also has very minimal smell and virtually non-sticky once dried.
customer_reviews.author: alex coe

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: Great Self Tanner! I love the glow it gives me and the color. Looks like a natural tan!
customer_reviews.author: lauren geduld

customer_reviews.title: Not dark enough
customer_reviews.text: As a tan junkie I expect to look dark. I usually use a product called Fake Bake but wanted to try something new. While this product smells delightful and applies easily, it just wasn’t dark enough. I’d be a customer again if they released a darker option.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb B.

customer_reviews.title: No scent, no streaks
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So like many of you I have tried plenty of suntan lotions. These mouse are amazing! No scent and no streaks. I have used both my hands and mittens and have never had any issues. This mouse Truly leaves you with a natural tan. I have nothing bad to say about it. Worth every penny. Exfoliate before and you will look amazing. All this saying from a native south Florida woman. Enjoy ladies!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this self tanner. Omg, goes on very easily and smoothly. It has no self tanner smell which is excellent. I am very fair and the color of the self tanner is perfect. I put a second coat on and now I am very tan, in a good way. It also does not transfer onto clothes sheets or any other materials that might be near your skin.
customer_reviews.author: susanna johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: Best color of all self tanners. I have used all of the self tanners from the cheap stuff to the best at Sephora and ulta. I love this color. It is so pretty. It’s a golden natural looking even tan. It is a little pricey for the size but it is worth it for special occassions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Mancini

customer_reviews.title: No smell whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: My issue with self tanners has always been the smell. Even products marketed with a "new and improved" smell are still terrible - they just have more fragrance added as a sad attempt to mask the stink. Not this beauty of a product! I couldn't be happier with this COMPLETELY ODORLESS product. (Oh, and the tan is great too.) I've never used a foam / mousse before, but it applied easily, dried quickly, and left my previously pale, supersad legs with a nice bit of color. Winner winner!
customer_reviews.author: P & A Woods

customer_reviews.title: The best! Look no further!!
customer_reviews.text: I am white as snow. I have tried everything and I mean Everything from St. Tropez to fake bake to jergens. Nothing compares to this! I am so glad I read reviews and orders this. Will definitely buy again. I do exfoliate and shave then apply light layer of plain lotion all over since my skin is dry. I use a mitt and gently buff it in like cake icing, not deep rub in. I repeat all over (2x total). Wear a loose t shirt to bed and wake up so tan! No bad odor. It lasts about 4-5 days and evenly fades. It truly is a gem. Well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: lauren mcveigh

customer_reviews.title: Really works an so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Although i live in miami, This product has saved me from feeling like i need to spend hours in the sun or tons of money on a spray tan. It's so convenient and leaves you with a really nice natural looking glow! Very happy to have found it!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brill

customer_reviews.title: Best mousse I have used
customer_reviews.text: Best mousse I have used! Instant color and just gets better through out the day! Would recommend a mitt for application!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Horn

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Put it on, and instantly I had a horrible reaction! Fortunately I only put it on a small area. They recommend using gloves for good reasons!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Szypkowski

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tan! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I have been loyal to Loving Tan and St. Tropez for many years!! I ordered this based off the good reviews and I’m so glad I did!! The price is half the cost and there is absolutely no scent. None! The color develops really nice and turns into a gorgeous golden (not orange) tan. My boyfriend even commented on how natural it looks. I highly highly recommend using a mitt to apply! (I used the one from Loving Tan)
customer_reviews.author: KLeSanDiego

customer_reviews.title: The glow of a natural tan without the cons of a self tanner !
customer_reviews.text: Feels like you just took a trip to Cancun and came back :) Best self tanner ! No bad smell or orangy patches on your skin. The mousse is really easy to apply and you see the results instantly !
customer_reviews.author: azran attias melisa

customer_reviews.title: easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: The mouse formula is very easy to apply. i use nitrile gloves for my body or tan mitts and for my back I use a mirror with a "cream applicator " so I see what i'm doing,, then rinse the back applicator off when i'm finished applying. I am pretty fair but i get compliments on my tan because it looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Ghost to nice bronze tan
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a sunless tanner in years and did some comparison shopping before committing to this one. I'm pretty pale during the winter--like a ghost--and this tanner helped me reach my typical peak-summer tan within a few hours. I should add that I bought a mitt to help apply it, which I really think made a big difference. My only complaint is that it collected in the creases of my face by the end of the day, like my smile lines and very faintly around my eyes, which of course made me look older. So I'd suggest maybe not using it on your face and find another method.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing self tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using self tanners for a very long time now. Have used the best of the best and salon spray tans as well. This goes on so evenly, color is beautiful!! And dries fairly quickly, you will not feel sticky all day long. Not streaky and smell is decent! I would promote this product all day long !
customer_reviews.author: leah brady

customer_reviews.title: I'm pale and it gives a great color. Definitely doesn't last very long but that's ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pale and it gives a great color. Definitely doesn't last very long but that's expected. Follow the instructions! Says do not get wet for 6-8 hours and it's true you'll have bad streaking. Get a glove to spread it or it'll stain your hands. Love putting it on the day before the lake to give a great tan look.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: No more St. Tropez!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful golden tan !!! Doesn’t streak or look orangey. Make sure you apply with a tanning mitt or it will stain your hands ... I used to use St. Tropez tanning mousse but it was a lot more expensive... this stuff is just as good ! Love it!!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Donna C. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great formula!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but this product is so great, I felt like sharing. First, it leaves you with a nice build able color. I did one pump per leg and it looks super natural. The formula also drys quickly and does not smell like other self tanners. It was easy to apply and I just have a few spots around my feet to work on but overall the color is even and not streaky. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Margaret

customer_reviews.title: No smell!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good fake tan that's not over priced for SO long! This hits the Mark! Colour guide is a nice brown colour when first put on and develops well underneath so still brown once showered! (I left it on overnight) Biggest bonus for me is there was no smell! Normally I hate sleeping in tan but no lie there wasn't that horrible fake tan smell at all..even my hubby approved! 😝
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great self Tanner I recommend getting the brush to do your face! And a mitt for body little goes a long way for your face
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Very forgiving and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Very forgiving and easy to apply. I’ve used A LOT of self tanners and this has no smell. Good color. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wittstadt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Self Tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite self tanner (and i've tried a ton.) I love the color on it, the scent isnt strong and the products are moisturizing and nourishing. I used to always buy way more expensive self tanners but i honestly feel like this one works the best for me! I will never not have this self tanner stocked in my bathroom, it's that good :)
customer_reviews.author: MSaff

customer_reviews.title: Natural look and a GREAT Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just love it! No smell, smooth application with my mitt & a little goes a long way! Looks so very natural like the sun kissed my skin! Arrived on time and they followed up with me! I will order again! Thanks so much for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: The smell is terrible. Way worse/stronger than others ive tried. Streaky, even though I exfoliate and use a clean mitt - haven't had that problem with others. The color is not the greatest either, atleast for me.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I bought this because there were quite a few good reviews. I needed to tan before going on vacation. This stuff is a foam, which would make you think it would go on smooth. No way! As you start to rub it in it hardens and leaves a chunky residue, due to this it went on VERY patchy. It also has an odd smell. Will never buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was a wedding gift for my daughter. Great product. Received excellent customer service. Please give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: elise's mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the best self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: Fool proof self tanner. Very easy to apply and no streaks!
customer_reviews.author: Igor Anapolsky

customer_reviews.title: Use a tanning mitt for best results
customer_reviews.text: Skipped the sunburn and went straight for the tan! Thank you for making this amazing tanner. Im hooked! Always use a tanning mitt for best results. Love all the products Miami Gorgeous makes.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Matluck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glow!
customer_reviews.text: I highly reccomend this product. I use surgical gloves to apply this (I find it easier than a mit). Very quick to dry down with no scent which is important to me. Notice results within same day of first application. I use this at night then shower in the morning, I find it to last a week with only one or two applications. Beautiful glow, not orange or shimmery. Great price.. I will def repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Amazing self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner!! Color is perfect- natural, bronzy, not orangey at all. The smell is very very minimal compared to any other self tanners, and it has a pretty tint that allows you to see if you missed a spot. The pump was easy to use, and I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

product_meta.title: Miami Gorgeous Self Tanning Mousse LaPlaya Glow Instant Self Tanner Bronzing Mousse to Tan Skin Organic Ingredients Best Natural Self Tanner Satisfaction Guarantee 4.2 oz
product_meta.description:
★Miami Gorgeous Self Tanning Mousse is the easy way to build a flawless, natural-looking tan you will love.★ 

✦La Playa Glow Self Tanning Mousse - A Breakthrough in Self Tanner✦

This radiant bronzing complex is formulated with the highest quality ingredients that will make your body look stunning. Enriched with Argan Oil, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Elderflower Extract, this quick drying self tanning mousse replenishes skin as your sunless tan develops.

Your skin will be beautifully tanned and amazingly nourished

This self tanning mousse leaves your skin perfectly tanned, with absolutely no scent, and is 100% streak free. Unlike many self-tanners it doesn't turn your skin orange. Miami Gorgeous Sunless Tanner is a breakthrough in tanning. Before use, exfoliate skin, then rub in using a tanning mitt or hand in circular motion; wait until skin is dry before dressing.

Why this self-tanning mousse should be added today to your summer essentials

✔ Perfect for both body and face
✔ Enriched with Organic Oils and Extracts (Argan Oil, Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Elderflower Extract)
✔ It’s easy to apply: Shower, apply, and dress
✔ Paraben Free, Sulfate Free, Eco Certified DHA, Gluten Free, No Animal Testing

What is your risk? Nothing. 

If you are not happy with your product we will refund 100% of your money. Our products are always backed by 100% Money Back No Question Asked Guarantee! Get this self tanning mousse today. You will not regret investing in high quality self tanner for your skin

Click the Add to Cart button now and get your very own Miami Gorgeous Self Tanning Mousse TODAY!
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY -  Infused with Argan Oil and Coconut Oil this is the best self tanner on the market. Provides you with an instant natural bronze color that will make your body look stunning. Note that this self-tanner has pure vitamins and natural oils, leaving your skin perfectly tanned, smooth and streak free. Miami Gorgeous Sunless Tanner is the best tanner you have ever used.

ORGANIC DHA - Miami Gorgeous LaPlaya Glow Self Tanning Mousse is a breakthrough in self tanner. Made of good for you ingredients perfectly blended will provide a rich, natural and perfectly looking tan. Formulated with Argan Oil, Vitamin A, C, D, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil and Elderflower extract. Radiant Bronzing Complex gives you an instant bronze glow. LaPlaya Glow Self Tanning Mousse will give you a golden glow and a soft skin you will definitely love.

VERSATILE SELF-TANNER - Perfect bronze color is never streaky or orange. Simply apply Miami Gorgeous LaPlaya Self Tanning Mousse. This fast absorbing mousse formula gives an instant bronze to skin and dries quickly. The bottle contains about 10-12 full body uses. Apply with tanning mitt or hands.

SAFE TO USE - This self tanning mousse uses high quality ingredients that are safe for men and women and all skin types, even for the most sensitive skin. Made in the USA - GLUTEN FREE, PARABEN FREE, NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS, ECO CERTIFIED DHA.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! Our products are always backed by 100% Money Back No Question Asked Guaranteed!
